EM0001_00_0.name: Rathian
EM0001_00_0.explain: The "Queen of the Land," these female fire- breathing wyverns are known for their powerful legs and lethal, poison-secreting tails.
EM0001_00_0.features: Fire-breathing female wyverns known as the "Queens of the Land." Their powerful legs and venomous tails make them efficient ground hunters. At times, Rathian and Rathalos can be sighted hunting as a couple. After laying eggs, Rathian are extremely watchful of their nests. Proceed with extra caution, as a mother will move swiftly to protect her young.
EM0001_00_0.tips: Hunters will need to maneuver carefully to avoid the potent venom in the Rathian's tail spikes and her wide attack range. By severing the tail, you can limit her reach and gain the upper hand. After breathing fire, the inside of the Rathian's mouth becomes tender, making it a prime target to strike.

explain_langs.Japanese: 大地を駆ける優れた脚力と、猛毒をもつ尾が 特徴の≪雌火竜（めすかりゅう）≫。 それらの特徴から、陸の女王とも呼ばれる。
explain_langs.English: The "Queen of the Land," these female fire- breathing wyverns are known for their powerful legs and lethal, poison-secreting tails.
explain_langs.French: La "Reine de la terre", une wyverne femelle crachant du feu, connue pour ses pattes puissantes et sa queue au venin mortel.
explain_langs.Italian: Esemplari femmine di wyvern sputafuoco, note come "regine della terra" per le loro zampe potenti e le code letali che secernono veleno.
explain_langs.German: Feuerspeiende weibliche Wyvern, denen ihre kräftigen Beine und hochgiftiger Schwanz den Namen „Königin des Landes“ eingebracht haben.
explain_langs.Spanish: Las "reinas de la tierra", wyverns hembra escupefuego, son conocidas por sus patas fuertes y sus mortíferas colas venenosas.
explain_langs.Russian: Огнедышащих самок виверн прозвали «королевами земли». У них мощные лапы и смертоносные ядовитые шипы на хвосте.
explain_langs.Polish: Zwane "Królowami Ziemi", te ziejące ogniem samice wiwerny słyną z potężnych nóg i śmiercionośnych, wytwarzających truciznę ogonów.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: As "Rainhas da Terra", serpes fêmeas cuspidoras de fogo, são conhecidas por suas pernas poderosas e caudas letais que secretam veneno.
explain_langs.Korean: 대지를 누비는 튼튼한 다리와 맹독을 품은 꼬리가 특징인 《자화룡》. 이런 특징 때문에 육지의 여왕이라고 불린다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 雌火龍的特徵是出色的奔跑能力，以及具有猛毒的 尾巴。這些特徵讓牠獲得了「陸之女王」的外號。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 拥有纵横大陆的强劲脚力以及猛毒之尾，这些特征 亦赋予了它“陆之女王”的别称。
explain_langs.Arabic: "ملكات الأرض"، إناث وايفرن نافثة للنار، تُعرف بأرجلها القوية وذيولها الفتاكة النافثة للسم.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Wyverns hembra conocidas como "reinas de la tierra". Pueden escupir fuego y poseen patas fuertes y mortíferas colas venenosas.

EM0002_00_0.name: Rathalos
EM0002_00_0.explain: Fearsome wyverns known as "Kings of the Skies." Armed with powerful poison claws, they use their aerial prowess to descend on prey from above.
EM0002_00_0.features: Fearsome male wyverns known as the "Kings of the Skies." Alongside the Rathian, they stake out a wide territory around their nests, and it is the male's role to watch from above. Armed with powerful poisonous claws and fiery breath, Rathalos use their aerial prowess to descend on invaders.
EM0002_00_0.tips: As Kings of the Skies, Rathalos will attack with a variety of aerial strikes. A bright flash should be enough to disorient them and bring them down. When Rathalos are in trouble, their Rathian mates may swoop in to help, so be sure to have dung pods and large dung pods at the ready.

explain_langs.Japanese: 天空の王者と呼称され、畏れられる飛竜。 優れた飛行能力で上空から急降下し、 毒をもつ強力な爪で襲いかかる。
explain_langs.English: Fearsome wyverns known as "Kings of the Skies." Armed with powerful poison claws, they use their aerial prowess to descend on prey from above.
explain_langs.French: Forts de leurs griffes empoisonnées, les "Rois des cieux" n'ont pas leur pareil pour attaquer depuis les airs.
explain_langs.Italian: Temibili wyvern noti come "sovrani dei cieli". Dotati di potenti artigli velenosi, sono soliti piombare abilmente dall'alto sulle loro prede.
explain_langs.German: Furchterregende Wyvern, die als „Könige der Lüfte“ bekannt sind. Sie stürzen sich mit Giftklauen aus dem Himmel auf ihre Beute.
explain_langs.Spanish: Wyverns temibles conocidos como los "reyes de los cielos". Provistos de fuertes garras venenosas, se lanzan en picado sobre sus presas desde arriba.
explain_langs.Russian: Виверны, прозванные «королями небес», высматривают добычу сверху и пикируют, пронзая её покрытыми ядом когтями.
explain_langs.Polish: Straszliwe wiwerny, ci „Królowie Przestworzy” są uzbrojeni w silne, trujące pazury. Swoją powietrzną sprawność przejawiają atakami z góry.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Temíveis serpes conhecidos como "Reis dos Céus". Armados com poderosas garras venenosas, usam sua primazia aérea para atacar presas que vêm do céu.
explain_langs.Korean: 하늘의 왕자라 불리며 경외시되는 비룡. 우수한 비행 능력으로 하늘에서 급강하해 독을 품은 강력한 발톱으로 공격한다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 擁有天空王者之名，受人畏懼的飛龍。會以優異的 飛行能力從高空迅速降下，並使用帶毒的強力爪擊 攻擊敵人。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 令人畏惧的飞龙，又称“天空王者”。它会以优异 的飞行能力，从上空急速俯冲而下，以含毒的利爪 攻击对方。
explain_langs.Arabic: تنانين وايفرن مهيبة تُعرف باسم "ملوك السماء". مسلحة بمخالب سامة قوية وتستخدم براعتها في الطيران للانقضاض على فريستها من الأعلى.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Wyverns temibles llamados "reyes de los cielos". Dotados de fuertes garras venenosas, embisten a sus presas en picada con su gran pericia aérea.

EM0002_50_0.name: Guardian Rathalos
EM0002_50_0.explain: An artificial species created by an ancient civilization with a Rathalos's power. Beware the energy released by their powerful claw attacks.
EM0002_50_0.features: An artificial monster species created by an ancient civilization and imbued with Rathalos's power. Guardian Rathalos cannot reproduce and do not require food, relying instead on Wyvern Milk for energy. Just like the original Rathalos, they are superior fliers and will attack more violently with their claws while airborne.
EM0002_50_0.tips: The unique Guardian energy from Guardian Rathalos's claw attacks is explosive and dangerous. This energy will cause wyvern milk on the ground to crystalize, and if these crystals are hit by the monster's fire attacks it will cause an explosion of the same element. Given that they are triggered by elemental interference, Slinger ammo could be used effectively against them.

explain_langs.Japanese: 古代文明によって、≪火竜≫の力を宿し 生み出された造竜種。エネルギー放出を ともなう爪の攻撃が強力。
explain_langs.English: An artificial species created by an ancient civilization with a Rathalos's power. Beware the energy released by their powerful claw attacks.
explain_langs.French: Espèce artificielle créée par une ancienne civilisation, dotée des pouvoirs du Rathalos. Attention à la puissance de ses coups de griffes.
explain_langs.Italian: Una specie artificiale creata da un'antica civiltà, che possiede i poteri del Rathalos. Attenzione all'energia rilasciata dalle sue artigliate.
explain_langs.German: Eine von einer uralten Zivilisation mit der Kraft eines Rathalos geschaffene künstliche Spezies. Vorsicht vor der Energie in den Klauenangriffen.
explain_langs.Spanish: Una especie artificial creada por una civilización ancestral con la energía de un Rathalos. Cuidado con la energía de sus garras.
explain_langs.Russian: Древняя цивилизация, создавшая этих монстров, наделила их силой раталоса. Пуская в ход когти, они высвобождают накопленную энергию.
explain_langs.Polish: Sztuczny gatunek stworzony z mocy Rathalosa przez starożytną cywilizację. Uważaj na energię uwalnianą przy ich potężnych atakach pazurami.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Espécie artificial criada por uma civilização antiga com o poder de Rathalos. Cuidado com a energia emitida pelos ataques com suas garras.
explain_langs.Korean: 고대 문명에 의해 《화룡》의 힘을 품고 만들어진 인조룡종. 에너지 방출을 동반한 발톱 공격이 강력하다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 古代文明創造的造龍種，帶有火龍之力。 利爪攻擊時會釋放能量，非常強力。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 古代文明创造出的造龙种，带有火龙之力。 其利爪攻击时会释放能量，十分强悍。
explain_langs.Arabic: سلالة اصطناعية خلّقتها حضارة قديمة باستخدام قوة راثالوس. <LSNR "انتبه" "انتبهي"> للطاقة المنبعثة من هجمات مخالبها القوية.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Una especie artificial creada por una antigua civilización con el poder de un Rathalos. Cuidado con la energía de sus ataques con garras.

EM0005_00_0.name: Gravios
EM0005_00_0.explain: Large wyverns found in the Oilwell Basin. Their highly developed carapaces repel attacks and emit powerful heat rays.
EM0005_00_0.features: Large wyverns found in Oilwell Basin. They have a developed physique, powerful heat rays, and a host of gases they can emit from their body. Their bony carapaces are famously tough but expose a surprisingly brittle interior once destroyed.
EM0005_00_0.tips: It's no easy task breaking through that heavy armor covering a Gravios head to talon, but repeated attacks will eventually make a crack. That—and the weaknesses a Gravios exposes in its carapace during certain attacks—are your chances to deliver Focus Strikes, demolish it piece by piece, and create even more opportunities.

explain_langs.Japanese: 油涌き谷に現れる大型の飛竜。 強固に発達した外殻に覆われており、 強力な熱線を放つ。
explain_langs.English: Large wyverns found in the Oilwell Basin. Their highly developed carapaces repel attacks and emit powerful heat rays.
explain_langs.French: Grandes wyvernes du Bassin pétrolier. Protégées par leur épaisse cuirasse, elles crachent de puissants rayons thermiques.
explain_langs.Italian: Grandi wyvern che abitano il Bacino petrolifero. Il loro carapace sviluppato respinge gli attacchi ed emettono potenti raggi termici.
explain_langs.German: Große Wyvern aus dem Ölquellbecken. Ihre hoch entwickelten Panzer wehren Angriffe ab und senden mächtige Hitzestrahlen aus.
explain_langs.Spanish: Wyverns gigantescos de la Cuenca Oleosa. Sus desarrolladas corazas repelen los ataques y lanzan rayos de calor abrasadores.
explain_langs.Russian: Крупные виверны, обитающие в Нефтяной низине. Их тело защищено прочным панцирем, а атакуют они испепеляющими лучами.
explain_langs.Polish: Duże wiwerny z Kotliny Oleju. Uzbrojone są w wysoko rozwinięte karapaksy, które odpychają ataki oraz emitują potężne promienie cieplne.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Grandes serpes encontradas na Bacia Oleídea. Suas carapaças superdesenvolvidas repelem ataques e emitem poderosos raios de calor.
explain_langs.Korean: 기름 솟는 계곡에 나타나는 대형 비룡. 딱딱하게 발달한 껍데기에 덮여 있으며 강력한 열선을 쏜다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 湧油山谷中出現的大型飛龍。身體以堅固外殼 包覆，能釋放出強力的熱線。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 出现在涌油谷的大型飞龙。全身覆盖着坚硬 的外壳，且能释放强力的高热射线。
explain_langs.Arabic: وايفرن كبيرة توجد في حوض آبار النفط. هياكلها شديدة التطور تصد الهجمات وتطلق أشعة حرارية قوية.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Wyverns gigantes de la Cuenca Oleosa. Sus desarrolladas corazas repelen los ataques y emiten poderosos rayos abrasadores.

EM0008_00_0.name: Yian Kut-Ku
EM0008_00_0.explain: Bird wyverns with impressive beaks, big ears, and an appetite for insects. Skittish by nature, they will still put up a fight if threatened.
EM0008_00_0.features: Bird wyverns with impressive beaks and large ears. They tend to be skittish but will sometimes initiate attacks on a perceived threat. Yian Kut-Ku arrive in large groups during the season of Plenty in the Scarlet Forest. The absence of eggs or young suggests that the purpose of this is not to breed, but rather to seek out mates and nourishment.
EM0008_00_0.tips: The Yian Kut-Ku's superior hearing comes with great sensitivity to sound. A loud noise is sometimes all it takes to stop them in their tracks, reason enough to make liberal use of sonic bombs. But there's a catch: once a Yian Kut-Ku comes back to itself, it's going to be really flocking mad and come at a hunter even more viciously than before.

explain_langs.Japanese: 大きな耳と、立派な顎が特徴の鳥竜種。 憶病な性格だが外敵には果敢に立ち向かう。 虫を好んで食べる姿が、たびたび目撃される。
explain_langs.English: Bird wyverns with impressive beaks, big ears, and an appetite for insects. Skittish by nature, they will still put up a fight if threatened.
explain_langs.French: Wyvernes rapaces insectivores au grand bec et aux larges oreilles. De nature craintive, ils attaquent sans hésiter s'ils se sentent menacés.
explain_langs.Italian: Wyvern rapaci con becchi imponenti, dalle orecchie grandi e ghiotti d'insetti. Sebbene timidi per natura, attaccano se minacciati.
explain_langs.German: Vogelwyvern mit eindrucksvollen Schnäbeln, großen Ohren und Appetit auf Insekten. Sie sind scheu, aber gefährlich, wenn sie bedroht werden.
explain_langs.Spanish: Wyvern pájaro con un pico imponente, orejas enormes y un apetito voraz por los insectos. Son asustadizos, pero no rehúyen ninguna pelea.
explain_langs.Russian: Пернатые виверны с внушительными клювами и огромными ушами. Питаются насекомыми. Пугливы, но умеют постоять за себя.
explain_langs.Polish: Ptasie wiwerny z imponującymi dziobami, dużymi uszami i apetytem na owady. Z natury płochliwe, choć w razie zagrożenia potrafią walczyć.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Serpássaros com bicos impressionantes, orelhas grandes e famintos por insetos. São ariscos por natureza, mas lutarão se forem ameaçados.
explain_langs.Korean: 큰 귀와 근사한 턱이 특징인 조룡종. 겁이 많지만 적에게는 용감하게 맞선다. 벌레를 좋아해서 종종 먹는 모습이 목격된다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 有一對大耳朵和強壯喙部的鳥龍種。雖然天性 膽小，但面對外敵時會勇敢迎戰。常常能目擊 牠們捕食蟲子的模樣。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 有一对大耳朵和雄壮喙部的鸟龙种。天性胆小，但 面对外敌时却会勇敢应战。经常有人目睹它们喜食 虫类的样子。
explain_langs.Arabic: وايفرن طائرة ذات مناقير مدهشة وأذنين كبيرتين وشهية للحشرات. خجولة بطبيعتها، لكنها ستستمر في القتال إذا تعرضت للتهديد.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Wyverns pájaro con picos imponentes, orejas enormes y hambre de insectos. Son asustadizos, pero dan pelea a toda amenaza.

EM0009_00_0.name: Gypceros
EM0009_00_0.explain: Monsters that use their prominent crest to stun foes with disorienting flashes of light before finishing them off with poisonous saliva.
EM0009_00_0.features: Wyverns that can stun enemies by striking their prominent crests to produce powerful flashes of light. Their stretchy, rubbery hide resists blunt impacts and reduces the effectiveness of shock traps. A smart hunter knows to maneuver carefully around the poisonous filth they spew, which drips from ceilings or down slopes.
EM0009_00_0.tips: Faced with a Gypceros, a hunter has two headaches to deal with: the poison and the flashes. The poison will pool and hamper your movements, but you can clear it away with some watermoss. As for the flashes, destroying its crest will stop them; in the meantime, it's a good idea to take cover. If you can see its crest glow before the attack, that means you're still inside the dazzling danger radius.

explain_langs.Japanese: 頭部のトサカが特徴的なモンスター。 トサカを打ち合わせて発する閃光で外敵の 目を眩ませ、吐き出す毒で弱らせる。
explain_langs.English: Monsters that use their prominent crest to stun foes with disorienting flashes of light before finishing them off with poisonous saliva.
explain_langs.French: Monstres utilisant leur crête proéminente pour étourdir leurs ennemis avec des éclairs aveuglants avant de les achever avec leur salive venimeuse.
explain_langs.Italian: Mostri che usano la loro imponente cresta per stordire le minacce con bagliori accecanti, per poi sopraffarle con la saliva velenosa.
explain_langs.German: Ein Monster, das mit seinem auffälligen Kamm Feinde mit Lichtblitzen betäubt und dann mit Giftspeichel erledigt.
explain_langs.Spanish: Monstruos que emplean sus abultadas crestas para aturdir a sus enemigos con destellos de luz y apuntillarlas con saliva venenosa.
explain_langs.Russian: Монстры, которые используют гребень, чтобы ошеломить жертву вспышками света, и ядовитую слюну, чтобы её добить.
explain_langs.Polish: Potwory te wykorzystują swoje wydatne grzebienie do ogłuszania ofiar dezorientującym błyskiem światła, po czym wykańczają je trującą śliną.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Monstros que usam sua crista para atordoar seus inimigos com luzes piscantes, antes de eliminarem a presa com sua saliva venenosa.
explain_langs.Korean: 머리에 달린 볏이 특징인 몬스터. 볏을 맞부딪쳐 섬광을 발산해 적을 눈부시게 하며, 독을 내뿜어 사냥감을 약하게 만든다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 毒怪鳥的特徵是其頭冠。牠們會敲打頭冠發出 閃光，剝奪外敵的視野，並吐出毒液加以削弱。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 头冠极具特点的怪物。能通过敲打头冠释放闪光， 使外敌目眩，并吐出毒液加以削弱。
explain_langs.Arabic: وحوش تستخدم عُرفها البارز لصعق الأعداء بومضات ضوئية تسبب الدوار قبل القضاء عليها باللعاب السام.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Monstruos que emplean sus abultadas crestas para aturdir a sus enemigos con destellos de luz y rematarlos con saliva venenosa.

EM0021_00_0.name: Congalala
EM0021_00_0.explain: Large, pink fanged beasts. Beware their potent breath, which changes based on their mushroom diet, and stench, which disables recovery items.
EM0021_00_0.features: Large fanged beasts with pink fur and a distinct crest, which the males sculpt with plant oils and juices as a sign of virility. Congalala are common in temperate forests and are therefore well researched. They're big eaters and love mushrooms, which they absorb and then exhale as a variety of potent breaths that inflict poison, blast, paralysis, and more.
EM0021_00_0.tips: The stench from a Congalala is so rancid that healing items have no effect. But you can quickly dispel it with a deodorant or by evading in water. Those farts are also trouble, but a hunter might just spot an opportunity if they watch carefully. Congalala are also known to use any breath type—a trick some have attributed to the black mushrooms they're seen digging up.

explain_langs.Japanese: 桃色の毛並みをもつ大型の牙獣。食べたキノコの 特性に応じた多彩なブレスと、回復アイテムを 使用不能にする「悪臭状態」に注意。
explain_langs.English: Large, pink fanged beasts. Beware their potent breath, which changes based on their mushroom diet, and stench, which disables recovery items.
explain_langs.French: Grande bête à crocs rose. Attention à son souffle, aux effets variant selon le champignon ingéré, et à l'affliction puanteur, qui empêche tout soin.
explain_langs.Italian: Grandi belve zannute rosa. Hanno aliti letali, a seconda dei funghi di cui si nutrono, e il loro fetore rende inutilizzabili gli oggetti con effetti curativi.
explain_langs.German: Große Reißzahn-Bestien. Ändern durch Verzehr von Pilzen ihren Atem und stinken derart, das Heilmittel unbrauchbar sind.
explain_langs.Spanish: Enormes bestias rosadas y de colmillos. Mucho ojo a su aliento, que varía en función de las setas que ingiere. Y al hedor, que impide usar objetos.
explain_langs.Russian: Крупные клыкастые звери. Едят разные грибы, что определяет эффект их дыхания, а их зловоние не позволяет лечиться.
explain_langs.Polish: Duże, różowe, zębate bestie. Uważaj na ich silny oddech, który zależy od diety grzybowej, oraz na smród dezaktywujący przedmioty leczące.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Feras de presas grandes e rosas. Sua dieta de cogumelos altera o seu sopro poderoso e o Fedor inibe itens de regeneração.
explain_langs.Korean: 분홍색 털을 가진 대형 아수종. 먹은 버섯의 특성에 따라 달라지는 브레스와 회복 아이템을 못 쓰게 하는 악취 상태를 조심하자.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 擁有桃色毛皮的大型牙獸種。能按食下的蘑菇的 特性使出各種不同的吐息，並使獵人陷入無法 使用回復道具的惡臭狀態，需要多加留意。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 毛色粉红的大型牙兽。根据其吃下蘑菇的特性，能 使用种类繁多的吐息，并能使猎人陷入无法使用回 复道具的“恶臭状态”，需要小心应对。
explain_langs.Arabic: وحوش كبيرة ذات أنياب وردية اللون. <LSNR "احذر" "احذري"> من أنفاسها القوية، التي تتغير بناءً على نظامها الغذائي المكون من الفطر، وأيضًا من رائحتها الكريهة، التي تعطل عناصر الشفاء.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Enormes bestias con colmillos y pelaje rosado. Evita su aliento fétido que varía según su dieta de hongos y que anula los objetos curativos.

EM0022_00_0.name: Blangonga
EM0022_00_0.explain: Large, white fanged beasts that rule over other Blango, attacking as a pack. They exhibit a range of mobility, particularly in snowy climes.
EM0022_00_0.features: Large, white fanged beasts that rule over other Blango, attacking intruders as a pack. Its muscularity and mobility allows it to strike swiftly, even on fresh snow, and pounce from long distances—so hunters with long-range weapons still need to stay on guard. Large tusks are the mark of a powerful leader.
EM0022_00_0.tips: Blangonga use snowy ground to their advantage for extra mobility, and can summon other Blangos to gang up on unwary hunters. Use extra caution when they're angry, because they can direct the whole pack at a chosen target with perilous efficiency. Watch out for that freezing breath, too. Destroying a Blangonga's tusks is believed to undermine its authority with the other Blangos, disrupting their teamwork.

explain_langs.Japanese: ブランゴを率いる大型の白き牙獣。 縄張りを侵す者に対しては群れで攻撃を仕掛け、 雪深い環境では特に多彩な立ち回りを見せる。
explain_langs.English: Large, white fanged beasts that rule over other Blango, attacking as a pack. They exhibit a range of mobility, particularly in snowy climes.
explain_langs.French: Bête à crocs blanche régnant sur les Blango et attaquant en meute. Elle fait preuve d'une grande mobilité, surtout dans les milieux enneigés.
explain_langs.Italian: Grande belva zannuta e bianca che domina sugli altri Blango, attaccando in branco. Ha molta mobilità, soprattutto negli ambienti innevati.
explain_langs.German: Große, weiße Reißzahn-Bestie, die Blango- Rudel anführt. Sehr beweglich, besonders in verschneiten Umgebungen.
explain_langs.Spanish: Bestias enormes y blancas que controlan a otros Blango y atacan en manada. Tienen mucha movilidad, sobre todo en climas nevados.
explain_langs.Russian: Эти крупные клыкастые звери с белым мехом — вожаки бланго. Они нападают со стаей и быстро передвигаются по заснеженной местности.
explain_langs.Polish: Duże, białe, zębate bestie, które rządzą innymi Blango, atakując w stadzie. Wykazują dużą mobilność, szczególnie w śnieżnych klimatach.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Grandes feras brancas de presas que dominam outros Blangos, atacando em bando. Possuem muita mobilidade, especialmente em climas nevados.
explain_langs.Korean: 블랑고를 이끄는 하얀 대형 아수종. 영역을 침범한 자에게는 무리로 공격하며, 눈 쌓인 환경에서는 특히 다채로운 움직임을 보인다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 統率雪獅子的大型白色牙獸。會率領群體攻擊入侵 地盤的生物，在冰天雪地的環境中動作尤其多變。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 统率雪狮子的白色大型牙兽种。会率领群体对入 侵领地的生物发起攻击，积雪环境中的动作尤其 多变。
explain_langs.Arabic: وحوش بيضاء ضخمة ذات أنياب تسيطر على الـ(بلانغو)، وتهاجم في مجموعات. تتميز بمدى حركة خاصةً في المناخات الثلجية.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Bestias enormes y blancas que controlan a otros Blango y atacan en manada. Su rango de movilidad es amplio, particularmente en climas nevados.

EM0070_00_0.name: Nerscylla
EM0070_00_0.explain: Temnocerans that afflict poison, sleep, and webbing ailments—skillfully cornering prey, then hunting it with their pincer-like jaws.
EM0070_00_0.features: Temnocerans that inhabit the Iceshard Cliffs. They weave vast, sticky webs across their territory, using them and various status ailments to corner prey before utilizing pincer-like jaws to finish it off. Sometimes dead Gypceros can be found in the webs, the hides of which Nerscylla are known to adorn themselves with after devouring the rest of the carcass.
EM0070_00_0.tips: To defend against the poison, sleep, and binding effects of a Nerscylla's webbing, a hunter must go in duly prepared. While its powerful pincers are quite dangerous, they can and should be targeted as a weakness, provided they are approached correctly. The Gypceros hides draped on a Nerscylla's back are resistant to thunder but susceptible to fire—qualities that are reversed once the hide is destroyed.

explain_langs.Japanese: 毒、睡眠、糸拘束など複数の状態異常を 付与する鋏角種。巧みに獲物を追い詰め、 大きく発達した鋏角を使い仕留める。
explain_langs.English: Temnocerans that afflict poison, sleep, and webbing ailments—skillfully cornering prey, then hunting it with their pincer-like jaws.
explain_langs.French: Temnoceran utilisant ses toiles pour paralyser, empoisonner et endormir ses proies. Il les coince puis les chasse avec sa mâchoire.
explain_langs.Italian: Temnoceran che avvelenano, addormentano e paralizzano con ragnatele le prede, per poi cacciarle con fauci simili a chele.
explain_langs.German: Temnoceran, die die Statusanomalien Gift, Eingenetzt und Schlaf verursachen. Ihre Beute erlegen sie dann mit ihren Kieferklauen.
explain_langs.Spanish: Temnoceran que con su telaraña enmarañan, envenenan y duermen a su presa. Ya indefensa, le dan caza con sus mandíbulas como pinzas.
explain_langs.Russian: Темноцераны, способные отравить жертву, усыпить её или обездвижить паутиной. Загнав жертву в угол, они добивают её при помощи жвал.
explain_langs.Polish: Temnocerany zatruwają, usypiają i krępują ofiarę – sprytnie ją osaczają, po czym polują na nią, używając szczęk w kształcie szczypców.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Temnocerano que envenena, imobiliza e adormece a presa com sua teia, além de caçar e encurralar habilmente com sua mandíbula em forma de pinça.
explain_langs.Korean: 독, 수면, 실 속박 등 여러 상태 이상을 부여하는 협각종. 교묘하게 사냥감을 몰아넣고 커다랗게 발달한 협각을 사용해 숨통을 끊는다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 會讓對手陷入毒、睡眠、繩束縛等各種狀態異常 的鉗角種。會巧妙地把獵物逼進絕路，再用發達 的大鉗角殺死獵物。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 能发动毒、睡眠以及丝线束缚等多种状态异常攻 击的钳角种。它会巧妙地把猎物逼入绝境，再用 巨大的钳角给予其致命一击。
explain_langs.Arabic: وحش عنكبوتي يستخدم النسيج لتسميم الفريسة وتقييدها وتنويمها، ما يمكنه من محاصرتها بمهارة، ثم اصطيادها بفكيه الشبيهين بالكماشة.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Temnoceran que afligen veneno, enmarañado y sueño, acorralando hábilmente a la presa para luego cazarla con sus mandíbulas como pinzas.

EM0071_00_0.name: Gore Magala
EM0071_00_0.explain: Monsters draped in great wings like a black overcoat. They have no eyes, so instead they use a scattering of fine scales to locate prey.
EM0071_00_0.features: Monsters that drape themselves in their great wings, like a black overcoat. They have no eye sensory organs, so instead they use a scattering of fine scales from their wings to locate prey. When their sensory capacity increases, antennae appear on their heads and they unfurl their wings, entering the aggressive Frenzy State. Their black scales can Frenzy other creatures as well, making them fearsome adversaries.
EM0071_00_0.tips: Gore Magala will use its wings to attack anything it detects with its sensory scales without abandon. If a hunter contracts the Frenzy, their natural healing will decrease and any damage taken will increase, but an experienced hunter knows to keep attacking to raise their metabolism before the virus takes to avoid negative effects. Target the head to put a stop to Gore Magala's Frenzy.

explain_langs.Japanese: 黒い外套のような翼膜に身を包む ≪黒蝕竜（こくしょくりゅう）≫。眼をもたず 散布した鱗粉で対象を感知し、襲いかかる。
explain_langs.English: Monsters draped in great wings like a black overcoat. They have no eyes, so instead they use a scattering of fine scales to locate prey.
explain_langs.French: Monstres drapés dans de grandes ailes. Ils n'ont pas d'yeux et dispersent une multitude de fines écailles à la place pour repérer leurs proies.
explain_langs.Italian: Mostri ricoperti da grandi ali simili a un manto nero. Non hanno occhi, quindi usano varie scaglie fini per localizzare le prede.
explain_langs.German: Monster, das in Flügel gehüllt ist, die einem schwarzen Mantel gleichen. Augenlos, findet seine Beute mit Sinnesschuppen.
explain_langs.Spanish: Monstruos cubiertos por grandes alas, como un manto negro. No tienen ojos, así que usan una serie de escamas para ubicar a la presa.
explain_langs.Russian: Огромные крылья кровавой магалы служат ей подобием плаща. Эти незрячие монстры ищут добычу, рассеивая мельчайшие чешуйки.
explain_langs.Polish: Potwory odziane w wielkie skrzydła niczym czarny płaszcz. Nie mają oczu, więc rozrzucają drobne łuski w celu wykrycia ofiary.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Monstros cobertos por grandes asas, parecendo um sobretudo preto. Não possuem olhos, por isso usam as escamas para detectar suas presas.
explain_langs.Korean: 검은 외투 같은 익막으로 몸을 감싼 《흑식룡》. 눈이 없고, 살포한 인분으로 대상을 감지해 덮친다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 黑蝕龍全身被宛如黑色斗篷的翼膜包覆。牠沒有 眼睛，但會利用自己散布的鱗粉感知對象並攻擊。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 黑蚀龙全身包裹着宛如漆黑斗篷的翼膜。它没有 眼睛，但能依靠散布的鳞粉来感知目标并攻击。
explain_langs.Arabic: وحوش تتدلى أجنحتها العظيمة مثل معطف أسود. ليس لها عيون، ولذلك تعوض غيابها بنثر القشور الدقيقة لتحديد موقع الفريسة.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Monstruos cubiertos por grandes alas como mantos negros. No poseen ojos, así que dispersan finas escamas para detectar a sus presas.

EM0100_51_0.name: Guardian Fulgur Anjanath
EM0100_51_0.explain: An artificial species created by an ancient civilization with a Fulgur Anjanath's power. They can discharge lightning and have a nasty bite.
EM0100_51_0.features: An artificial monster species created by an ancient civilization and imbued with Fulgur Anjanath's power. Guardian Fulgur Anjanath cannot reproduce and do not require food, relying instead on Wyvern Milk for energy. Not only can the lightning charged in their bodies be released as an attack, they can also use it to empower themselves and perform vicious biting attacks.
EM0100_51_0.tips: A hunter must watch out for a Guardian Fulgur Anjanath's sparks and teeth. While their lightning attacks alone are a threat, their maws infused with Guardian energy will cause wide-range explosions. Try to topple one by aggressively targeting its legs. The crystals that form from their attacks will explode through elemental interference, so Slinger ammo can also be effective.

name_langs.Japanese: 護竜アンジャナフ亜種

explain_langs.Japanese: 古代文明によって、≪雷顎竜≫の力を宿し 生み出された造竜種。その身に帯びた雷の 放電と、強烈な噛みつき攻撃を繰り出す。
explain_langs.English: An artificial species created by an ancient civilization with a Fulgur Anjanath's power. They can discharge lightning and have a nasty bite.
explain_langs.French: Espèce artificielle créée par une ancienne civilisation dotée du pouvoir d'un Anjanath tonnerre. Lance des éclairs et mord.
explain_langs.Italian: Una specie artificiale creata da un'antica civiltà, che possiede i poteri dell'Anjanath tonante. Produce fulmini e ha un morso potente.
explain_langs.German: Eine von einer uralten Zivilisation mit der Kraft eines Fulgur-Anjanath geschaffene künstliche Spezies. Sie kämpfen mit Blitzen und Bisskraft.
explain_langs.Spanish: Una especie artificial creada por una civilización ancestral con la energía de un Anjanath Fulgúreo. Lanza rayos, y su mordisco es letal.
explain_langs.Russian: Древняя цивилизация, создавшая этих монстров, наделила их силой громового аньяната. Берегитесь клыков и электрических разрядов.
explain_langs.Polish: Sztuczny gatunek wyhodowany przez starożytną cywilizację nasycony mocą Piorunowego Anjanatha. Potrafi wyładowywać pioruny i mocno gryźć.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Espécie artificial criada por uma civilização antiga com o poder de um Anjanath Fulgurante. Podem descarregar raios e têm uma mordida feroz.
explain_langs.Korean: 고대 문명에 의해 《뇌악룡》의 힘을 품고 만들어진 인조룡종. 몸에 두른 번개를 방전하고 강렬한 물어뜯기 공격을 펼친다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 古代文明創造的造龍種，帶有雷顎龍之力。 不但會釋放身上的雷電，還會施展強力的 撕咬攻擊。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 古代文明创造出的造龙种，带有雷颚龙之力。 能释放身上的雷电，还能施展强有力的撕咬攻击。
explain_langs.Arabic: سلالة اصطناعية خلّقتها حضارة قديمة باستخدام قوة (أنجاناث) رعدي. يمكنها إطلاق البرق والعض بشراسة.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Una especie artificial creada por una antigua civilización con el poder del Anjanath Fulgúreo. Lanza rayos y tiene una mordida devastadora.

EM0113_51_0.name: Guardian Ebony Odogaron
EM0113_51_0.explain: An artificial species created by an ancient civilization with an Ebony Odogaron's power. The flurries from their foreclaws pose a threat.
EM0113_51_0.features: An artificial monster species created by an ancient civilization and imbued with Ebony Odogaron's power. Guardian Ebony Odogaron cannot reproduce and do not require food, relying instead on Wyvern Milk for energy. They will attempt to corner targets with flurries of attacks from their well- developed claws and tails.
EM0113_51_0.tips: Guardian Ebony Odogaron are most notable for their honed claws that induce bleeding and dexterous tails, both of which carry Guardian energy that can trigger explosions. If their dragon-element attacks connect with Wylkrystals, it will cause an explosion of the same element. However, since the crystals are triggered through elemental interference Slinger ammo can also be used effectively.

explain_langs.Japanese: 古代文明によって、≪兇爪竜≫の力を宿し 生み出された造竜種。前脚から繰り出す 鋭い爪による連続攻撃が脅威となる。
explain_langs.English: An artificial species created by an ancient civilization with an Ebony Odogaron's power. The flurries from their foreclaws pose a threat.
explain_langs.French: Espèce artificielle créée par une ancienne civilisation dotée du pouvoir d'un Odogaron désastre. Attention aux griffes antérieures.
explain_langs.Italian: Una specie artificiale creata da un'antica civiltà, che possiede i poteri di un Odogaron d'ebano. Le sue artigliate sono pericolose.
explain_langs.German: Eine von einer uralten Zivilisation mit der Kraft eines Vulkan-Odogaron geschaffene künstliche Spezies. Die Vorderklauen sind extrem gefährlich.
explain_langs.Spanish: Una especie artificial creada por una civilización ancestral con potencia de Odogaron Ébano. Sus garras delanteras son un peligro.
explain_langs.Russian: Древняя цивилизация, создавшая этих монстров, наделила их силой эбенового одогарона. Берегитесь быстрых и яростных ударов когтями.
explain_langs.Polish: Sztuczny gatunek wyhodowany przez starożytną cywilizację nasycony mocą Hebanowego Odogarona. Ataki jego przednich pazurów stanowią zagrożenie.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Espécie artificial criada por uma civilização antiga com o poder de um Odogaron Negro. Usa as garras dianteiras em perigosos ataques em série.
explain_langs.Korean: 고대 문명에 의해 《흉조룡》의 힘을 품고 만들어진 인조룡종. 앞다리에서 나온 날카로운 발톱을 휘두르는 연속 공격이 위협적이다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 古代文明創造的造龍種，帶有兇爪龍之力。 以前腳施展的銳爪連續攻擊非常具威脅。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 古代文明创造出的造龙种，带有凶爪龙之力。 它挥舞前肢，以利爪施展的连续攻击极具威胁。
explain_langs.Arabic: سلالة اصطناعية خلّفتها حضارة قديمة باستخدام قوة (أودوغارون) أسمر. تشكّل العواصف المنطلقة من مخالبها الأمامية تهديدًا.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Una especie artificial creada por una antigua civilización con el poder de un Odogaron Ébano. Cuidado con las ráfagas de sus garras delanteras.

EM0150_00_0.name: Doshaguma
EM0150_00_0.explain: Rugged, territorial fanged beasts that exhibit an aggressive disposition and inhabit a large range. Sometimes observed in large packs.
EM0150_00_0.boss_explain: Alpha Doshaguma are identifiable by their deeper red color and larger frame. Tread lightly—one of them is most likely leading a pack.
EM0150_00_0.features: Fanged beasts that are sometimes seen traveling in packs. Ruggedly built and extremely aggressive, Doshaguma won't hesitate to throw everything they've got at enemies—even other small monsters. They have been known to take prey back to their dens, which sometimes leads to violent disputes.
EM0150_00_0.tips: When Doshaguma are low on health, their wounds open exposing a weak point. They'll grow more aggressive, though, so beware of counterattacks. Their stomachs are exposed when rising to their hind legs, which is a relatively soft target and potential weak point. Use their mobility to lure them into rock and vine traps. If a Doshaguma pack attacks during a separate hunt, dung pods and large dung pods are a hunter's best friend.

explain_langs.Japanese: 強靭な体躯が特徴の≪闢獣（びゃくじゅう）≫。 縄張り意識が強く、広い行動範囲と強い攻撃性を もつ。時折、大規模な群れも目撃されている。
explain_langs.English: Rugged, territorial fanged beasts that exhibit an aggressive disposition and inhabit a large range. Sometimes observed in large packs.
explain_langs.French: Bêtes à crocs territoriales agressives par nature et aux habitats divers. Parfois observées en meute.
explain_langs.Italian: Belve zannute, robuste e territoriali che hanno un'indole aggressiva e popolano un'ampia regione. Spesso si muovono in branco.
explain_langs.German: Kräftige, territoriale Reißzahn-Bestien mit ei- nem aggressiven Temperament, die vielerorts und in großen Rudeln auftreten können.
explain_langs.Spanish: Bestias de colmillos fuertes y territoriales con un marcado carácter agresivo y un gran radio de acción. Suelen ir en manadas.
explain_langs.Russian: Могучие клыкастые звери с большим ареалом обитания. Ревностно защищают территорию. Иногда сбиваются в стаи.
explain_langs.Polish: Potężne, terytorialne zębate bestie, wykazujące agresywne usposobienie i zamieszkujące rozległe tereny. Można je spotkać w dużych stadach.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Feras de presas afiadas e territoriais que exibem tendências agressivas e habitam uma grande área. Às vezes são vistas em bandos.
explain_langs.Korean: 강인한 몸이 특징인 《벽수》. 영역 의식이 강하며 행동 범위가 넓고 공격성이 높다. 종종 대규모 무리도 목격된다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 闢獸的特徵在於強壯的身軀。牠們地盤意識極強， 行動範圍廣且攻擊性高，偶爾也能目擊到大規模 的群體。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 以强韧的躯体著称，有强烈的领地意识，行动范围 广泛且攻击性强。偶尔也会目击到大规模的群体。
explain_langs.Arabic: وحوش قوية ذات أنياب تدافع عن منطقة نفوذها وتظهر ميولًا عدوانية وتعيش في مناطق واسعة. يتم رصدها أحيانًا في قطعان كبيرة.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Fuertes y territoriales bestias con colmillos, un carácter agresivo y un gran radio de acción. Suelen verse en grandes manadas.

EM0150_50_0.name: Guardian Doshaguma
EM0150_50_0.explain: An artificial species created by an ancient civilization with a Doshaguma's power. They boast an incredibly robust physique and can spew acid.
EM0150_50_0.features: An artificial monster species created by an ancient civilization and imbued with Doshaguma's power. Guardian Doshaguma cannot reproduce and do not require food, relying instead on Wyvern Milk for energy. While anything but agile, they're tough enough to charge right through attacks without flinching, making them extremely dangerous.
EM0150_50_0.tips: Most Guardian Doshaguma attacks are big forelimb swings. While not agile, the attacks that carry Guardian energy will cause wide explosions. Watch out for the acid in their saliva, which temporarily lowers defense. By dealing with their forearm attacks properly, you can expose a weak point worth exploiting. The crystals formed by their attacks will explode from elemental interference, making Slinger ammo effective.

explain_langs.Japanese: 古代文明によって、≪闢獣≫の力を宿し 生み出された造竜種。極めて頑強な 肉体を誇り、酸性の液体を吐き出す。
explain_langs.English: An artificial species created by an ancient civilization with a Doshaguma's power. They boast an incredibly robust physique and can spew acid.
explain_langs.French: Espèce artificielle créée par une ancienne civilisation dotée du pouvoir d'un Doshaguma. Très robuste et peut cracher de l'acide.
explain_langs.Italian: Una specie artificiale creata da un'antica civiltà, che possiede i poteri del Doshaguma.  Sono robusti e possono sputare acido.
explain_langs.German: Eine von einer uralten Zivilisation mit der Kraft eines Doshaguma geschaffene künstliche Spezies. Ihr Körper ist extrem robust und sie speien Säure.
explain_langs.Spanish: Una especie artificial creada por una civilización ancestral con la energía de un Doshaguma. Son muy robustos y pueden escupir ácido.
explain_langs.Russian: Древняя цивилизация, создавшая этих монстров, наделила их силой дошагумы. Они очень выносливы и к тому же умеют плеваться кислотой.
explain_langs.Polish: Sztuczny gatunek wyhodowany przez starożytną cywilizację nasycony mocą Doshagumy. Ma niezwykle mocną budowę i może pluć kwasem.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Espécie artificial criada por uma civilização antiga com o poder de um Doshaguma. Possuem corpos muito robustos e podem cuspir ácido.
explain_langs.Korean: 고대 문명에 의해 《벽수》의 힘을 품고 만들어진 인조룡종. 매우 강인한 육체를 자랑하며, 산성 액체를 내뿜는다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 古代文明創造的造龍種，帶有闢獸之力。擁有 非常強韌的肉體，會吐出酸性液體。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 古代文明创造出的造龙种，带有辟兽之力。 具备极其强韧的肉体，并能吐出酸性液体。
explain_langs.Arabic: سلالة اصطناعية خلّفتها حضارة قديمة باستخدام قوة (دوشاغوما). تتمتع ببنية جسدية قوية لدرجة مذهلة ويمكنها قذف الحمض.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Una especie artificial creada por una antigua civilización con el poder de un Doshaguma. Posee un cuerpo robusto y puede escupir ácido.

EM0151_00_0.name: Balahara
EM0151_00_0.explain: Desert-dwelling leviathans that use their supple, serpentine bodies to create quicksand traps. Weak against sonic bombs when they're submerged.
EM0151_00_0.features: Desert-dwelling leviathans that build carapaces out of the fulgurite formed by lightning strikes. They use their flexible skeletons and serpentine bodies to create quicksand traps for unwary prey. Inside their mouths are multiple eye-like sensory organs. The mucus they secrete contains luminous bacteria and is believed to aid visibility while they are submerged and other low-light conditions like sandstorms.
EM0151_00_0.tips: The interior of a Balahara's mouth is a soft target that can be exploited if you strike right after it expels mucus. Since they rely on heightened hearing while submerged, sonic bombs or screamer pods—obtainable from Baunos—are highly effective. Sometimes the large monster you're hunting will get sucked into a Balahara sand pit...but there's nothing stopping you from going after it.

explain_langs.Japanese: 砂地に生息する海竜種。柔軟に曲がる 身体で流砂を形成し、罠として利用する。 砂に潜っている間は音爆弾が有効。
explain_langs.English: Desert-dwelling leviathans that use their supple, serpentine bodies to create quicksand traps. Weak against sonic bombs when they're submerged.
explain_langs.French: Léviathans qui créent des gouffres de sable grâce à leur corps particulièrement souple. Sensibles aux bombes soniques quand ils sont dans le sable.
explain_langs.Italian: Leviathan del deserto che sfruttano la loro forma serpentina per creare trappole di sabbie mobili. Sottoterra sono sensibili alle bombe soniche.
explain_langs.German: Leviathane der Wüste, die ihre Schlangenkörper nutzen, um Treibsandfallen zu erzeugen. Schwach gegen Schallbomben, wenn sie untertauchen.
explain_langs.Spanish: Leviatanes moradores del desierto que emplean sus ágiles y serpenteantes cuerpos para crear arenas movedizas. Usa bombas sónicas si se sumergen.
explain_langs.Russian: Пустынные левиафаны. Умеют рыхлить песок, создавая ловушки. Когда роют, уязвимы к воздействию звуковых бомб.
explain_langs.Polish: Lewiatany pustynne wykorzystują swe giętkie, wężowate ciała, by tworzyć pułapki z ruchomych piasków. Podatne są na bomby akustyczne.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Leviatãs do deserto. Criam armadilhas de areia movediça com seus corpos serpentinos. São vulneráveis a bombas sônicas quando submergem.
explain_langs.Korean: 사막에 서식하는 해룡종. 유연하게 휘어지는 몸으로 모래 구덩이를 만들어 덫으로 쓴다. 모래 속에 있을 때는 음폭탄이 효과적이다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 棲息在沙地的海龍種。會以柔軟扭曲的身體形成 流沙並用作陷阱。牠們潛入沙中時，使用音爆彈 會相當有效。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 栖息在沙地的海龙种。它们利用灵活弯曲的身体形 成流沙，并将其作为陷阱。当它们潜入沙中，使用 音爆弹会非常有效。
explain_langs.Arabic: وحوش (ليفياثان) تعيش في الصحراء وتستخدم أجسامها المرنة الأفعوانية لإنشاء فخاخ الرمال المتحركة. عندما تنغمر الوحوش برمال الصحراء، تكون ضعيفة في مواجهة القنابل الصوتية.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Leviatanes del desierto que usan sus ágiles y serpenteantes cuerpos para crear trampas de arena. Vulnerables a las bombas sónicas cuando se sumergen.

EM0152_00_0.name: Chatacabra
EM0152_00_0.explain: Amphibians that affix rocks to their forelimbs to power up attacks. Break this "armor" to create an attack opening. The tongue is most vulnerable.
EM0152_00_0.features: Amphibians that use their long tongues to seize and devour prey such as Bulaqchi. Their evolved forelimbs store a sticky mucus-like substance. When agitated, Chatacabra rub their forelimbs against the ground to collect stone and ore, widening the range and destructiveness of their blows.
EM0152_00_0.tips: The Chatacabra's soft tongue is the place to strike; look for openings after their attacks or when they become tired. Destroying the ore stuck to their forelimbs will leave them wide open to attack. They roam a wide area, so environmental elements like falling boulders or Flashflies will be useful in taking them down. To give you an idea of how hungry these things can get, some hunters have witnessed them swallowing entire barrels during their charges.

explain_langs.Japanese: 粘着性の唾液によって前脚に鉱石等を付着させ、 自身を強化する両生種。付着物を狙い破壊すれば 攻撃のチャンスとなる。舌が弱点。
explain_langs.English: Amphibians that affix rocks to their forelimbs to power up attacks. Break this "armor" to create an attack opening. The tongue is most vulnerable.
explain_langs.French: Amphibiens fixant des pierres à leurs pattes avant pour gagner en force. Détruisez-les pour créer une ouverture. Leur langue est très vulnérable.
explain_langs.Italian: Anfibi che si potenziano fissando delle pietre negli arti anteriori. Distruggile per creare un'apertura d'attacco. La lingua è il punto debole.
explain_langs.German: Eine Amphibie, die ihre Vorderbeine zum Angriff mit Steinen verstärkt. Zerstöre diesen harten Schutz und greife die empfindliche Zunge an.
explain_langs.Spanish: Anfibios que adhieren rocas a sus extremidades delanteras para potenciar sus ataques. Destrúyelas para poder atacar. Su punto débil es la lengua.
explain_langs.Russian: Клеят к лапам камни, чтобы больнее бить. Сбейте их, и вам будет проще атаковать. Слабое место этих амфибий — язык.
explain_langs.Polish: Płazy przyczepiają sobie kamienie do przednich łap, by wzmocnić ataki. Zniszcz je, by stworzyć szansę na atak. Najbardziej wrażliwy jest język.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Anfíbios que reforçam os ataques fixando rochas em seus braços. Quebre essa "armadura" para criar uma abertura. São vulneráveis na língua.
explain_langs.Korean: 점착성 타액으로 앞다리에 광석 등을 부착해 자신을 강화하는 양서종. 부착물을 파괴하면 공격할 기회가 생긴다. 혀가 약점이다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 兩棲種，會利用帶黏性的唾液將礦石等物質附著在 前腳上，藉此強化自己。若瞄準並破壞附著物， 就會出現攻擊的機會。弱點是舌頭。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 两栖种。会利用有粘性的唾液将矿石等附着在前肢 上，从而强化自身。瞄准附着物加以破坏，即可创 造攻击良机。弱点是舌头。
explain_langs.Arabic: وحوش برمائية تُثبِّت الصخور على أطرافها الأمامية لتقوية الهجمات. <LSNR "عليكَ" "عليكِ"> بتدمير هذا 'الدرع' لفتح مجال للهجوم. اللسان هو المنطقة الأكثر ضعفًا.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Anfibios que adhieren rocas a sus patas delanteras para potenciar ataques. Destruye esta "armadura" para atacar. Su punto débil es la lengua.

EM0153_00_0.name: Quematrice
EM0153_00_0.explain: Brute wyverns that spread flammable vapor which they then ignite with their tails. They subsist on prey stolen from other predators.
EM0153_00_0.features: Brute wyverns with disproportionately long tails. They spread a flammable substance which vaporizes quickly, then ignite it by dragging their tails along the ground. By nature, Quematrice rarely hunt their own prey, and instead scavenge herbivore carrion left behind by other predators. This often leads to confrontations with other, smaller carnivores.
EM0153_00_0.tips: Keep an eye on where flammable material settles on the ground to gauge how much a Quematrice's fire will spread. Since they rely on their tails to attack from a distance as well as to start blazes, a hunter can weaken this monster significantly by cutting it off.

explain_langs.Japanese: 気化しやすい発火性の物質を撒いた後、 尻尾で擦り発火させ、炎上させる獣竜種。 他者が仕留めた獲物を奪い取る生態をもつ。
explain_langs.English: Brute wyverns that spread flammable vapor which they then ignite with their tails. They subsist on prey stolen from other predators.
explain_langs.French: Wyvernes de terre répandant une vapeur inflammable qu'elles embrasent grâce à leur queue. Elles se nourrissent en volant les proies d'autres monstres.
explain_langs.Italian: Wyvern brutali in grado di diffondere vapore infiammabile che poi accendono con le loro code. Si nutrono di prede rubate ad altri predatori.
explain_langs.German: Kleptoparasitäre Kampfwyvern, die brenn- bares Material verteilen, welches sie dann mit ihrem Schwanz entzünden.
explain_langs.Spanish: Wyverns brutales que propagan vapores inflamables a los que prenden fuego con la cola. Se alimentan de presas sustraídas a otros depredadores.
explain_langs.Russian: Свирепые виверны, выделяющие огнеопасный газ и поджигающие его хвостом. Питаются тем, что крадут у других хищников.
explain_langs.Polish: Brutalne wiwerny rozprzestrzeniające łatwopalne opary, które następnie podpalają swoimi ogonami. Żywią się zdobyczą skradzioną innym drapieżnikom.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Serpes brutas que espalham um vapor inflamável e depois o incendeiam com suas caudas. Sobrevivem roubando presas de outros predadores.
explain_langs.Korean: 기화하기 쉬운 발화성 물질을 뿌린 뒤 꼬리로 마찰시켜 불을 피우는 수룡종. 남이 사냥한 먹이를 빼앗는 습성이 있다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 獸龍種，會在灑下易揮發的點火物質後，再利用 尾巴磨擦點燃，引發火焰。習性獨特，會搶奪 其他魔物殺死的獵物。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 兽龙种。散布容易汽化的易燃物质后，摩擦尾巴将 之点燃，引发火焰。有抢夺其他怪物捕获的猎物的 习性。
explain_langs.Arabic: وايفرن غاشمة تنشر بخارًا قابلًا للاشتعال ومن ثم تشعله بذيولها. إنها تقتات على الفرائس التي تسرقها من المفترسات الأخرى.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Wyverns brutales que propagan vapores inflamables que encienden con la cola. Se nutren de presas robadas a otros depredadores.

EM0154_00_0.name: Lala Barina
EM0154_00_0.explain: Temnocerans native to the Scarlet Forest with distinctive, pirouette-like movements. The florets they release have a paralytic effect.
EM0154_00_0.features: Temnocerans native to the Scarlet Forest with distinctive, pirouette-like movements. Their fluids contain a neuroplegic agent which they mix with water to produce red, petal-like bristles on their abdomens. When agitated, Lala Barina open these bristles like a deadly, blossoming flower and release them as florets that paralyze whatever they come into contact with.
EM0154_00_0.tips: The paralytic effects of a single Lala Barina floret are weak and not enough to subdue a hunter, but repeated contact should be avoided. The stinger on their abdomens makes approaching from the rear a risky bet, but when tired, the stinger will stay exposed and vulnerable. There are reports that when in terrain such as their nests where they hang from above, sustained attacks will knock them down.

explain_langs.Japanese: 緋の森に生息する鋏角種。踊り子のような 回転運動が特徴的。獲物や外敵に向けて 飛ばすわた毛には、麻痺の効果がある。
explain_langs.English: Temnocerans native to the Scarlet Forest with distinctive, pirouette-like movements. The florets they release have a paralytic effect.
explain_langs.French: Temnocerans virevoltants vivant dans la Forêt écarlate. Les fleurons qu'ils projettent ont un effet paralysant.
explain_langs.Italian: Temnoceran originari della Foresta cremisi, noti per i loro movimenti simili a piroette. Rilasciano delle inflorescenze dall'effetto paralizzante.
explain_langs.German: Temnoceran aus dem Karminwald, die sich durch pirouettenartige Bewegungen auszeichnen. Ihr Flachshaar besitzt einen lähmenden Effekt.
explain_langs.Spanish: Temnoceran autóctonos del Bosque Escarlata. Realizan piruetas características y arrojan flósculos con efectos paralizantes.
explain_langs.Russian: Темноцераны, населяющие Багряный лес. Двигаются грациозно, будто танцуя. Мечут щетинки с парализующим веществом.
explain_langs.Polish: Temnoceran pochodzący ze Szkarłatnego Lasu porusza się niczym baletnica podczas piruetów. Wyrzuca paraliżujące różyczki.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Temnoceranos nativos da Floresta Escarlate com movimentos característicos, parecendo piruetas. Liberam flósculos com efeito paralisante.
explain_langs.Korean: 주홍빛 숲에 서식하는 협각종. 무용수 같은 회전 운동을 한다. 사냥감이나 적에게 날리는 솜털에는 마비 효과가 있다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 棲息在緋紅森林的鉗角種，特徵是會像舞者一面 旋轉一面移動。射向獵物和外敵的絨毛帶有麻痺 效果。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 栖息在绯红森林的钳角种。特征是会像舞者般进行 旋转运动。射向猎物和外敌的绒毛带有麻痹效果。
explain_langs.Arabic: وحوش عنكبوتية تستوطن الغابة القرمزية ذات حركات مميزة تشبه الرقص الدوار. الزهور التي تفرزها لها تأثير يسبب الشلل.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Temnoceran autóctonos del Bosque Escarlata que realizan piruetas características y lanzan flósculos con efectos paralizantes.

EM0155_00_0.name: Rompopolo
EM0155_00_0.explain: Dappled brute wyverns that prowl Oilwell Basin. The gas from their tongues is toxic, and the gas in their tails can detonate the earth.
EM0155_00_0.features: Dappled brute wyverns that prowl Oilwell Basin. They use their tails to inject gas into the ground and detonate it, then feed on the small creatures that are unearthed. The toxic gas they spray from their tongues serve to weaken prey, which they then finish off with the blasts. Rompopolo are extremely territorial and will readily engage their own kind.
EM0155_00_0.tips: Hunters must be wary of the Rompopolo's poisonous explosions. Gas sacs can be found all over their bodies; the anterior ones contain poison, while the posterior sacs are for explosions. If you see one start to swell, strike it to shrink it back down. When fighting in oilsilt, the blasts will kick up rubble that can act as stable footholds.

explain_langs.Japanese: 油涌き谷を根城とする斑色の獣竜。 舌先から毒性のガスを撒き散らし、尻尾の 先端から地中にガスを注入して爆発させる。
explain_langs.English: Dappled brute wyverns that prowl Oilwell Basin. The gas from their tongues is toxic, and the gas in their tails can detonate the earth.
explain_langs.French: Wyvernes de terre du Bassin pétrolier. Leur langue produit un gaz toxique et le gaz de leur queue déclenche des explosions sous terre.
explain_langs.Italian: Wyvern brutali maculati del Bacino petrolifero. Il gas della lingua è tossico, mentre quello della coda può far detonare il terreno.
explain_langs.German: Gesprenkelte Kampfwyvern, die im Ölquellbecken leben. Das Gas ihrer Zunge ist giftig, während das aus dem Schweif die Erde sprengen kann.
explain_langs.Spanish: Wyverns brutales moteados oriundos de la Cuenca Oleosa. El gas de sus lenguas es tóxico, mientras que el de la cola puede provocar explosiones.
explain_langs.Russian: Пёстрые свирепые виверны, обитающие в Нефтяной низине. Из языка выпускают отравляющий газ, а из хвоста — горючий, который взрывают под землёй.
explain_langs.Polish: Cętkowane wiwerny zwaliste grasujące w Kotlinie Oleju. Gaz wydzielany z ich języków jest toksyczny, a ten z ogona może rozsadzić ziemię.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Serpes brutas pintadas que rondam pela Bacia Oleídea. O gás que sai de suas línguas é tóxico, e o de suas caudas pode detonar o solo.
explain_langs.Korean: 기름 솟는 계곡에 사는 얼룩덜룩한 수룡. 혀끝으로 독성 가스를 뿌리며 꼬리 끝으로 땅속에 가스를 주입해 폭발시킨다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 在湧油山谷盤據的獸龍種，身上帶有斑紋。能從舌 尖噴射毒性瓦斯，還能從尾巴尖端往地下注入瓦斯 並引發爆炸。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 带有斑纹的兽龙种，以涌油谷为据地。不仅能从舌 尖喷射出有毒气体，还能通过尾巴末端将气体注入 地下并引发爆炸。
explain_langs.Arabic: وايفرن غاشمة مرقطة تجوب حوض آبار النفط. الغاز المنبعث من ألسنتها سام، ويمكن للغاز الموجود في ذيولها أن يفجر الأرض.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Wyverns brutales moteados oriundos de la Cuenca Oleosa. El gas de la lengua es tóxico y el de la cola puede detonar la tierra.

EM0156_00_0.name: Rey Dau
EM0156_00_0.explain: The flying wyvern that reigns supreme over the Windward Plains' ecosystem. It is able to store, amplify, and discharge the Sandtide's lightning.
EM0156_00_0.features: The flying wyvern that reigns supreme over the Windward Plains' ecosystem. It has adapted to the Sandtide—when it most frequently appears—and is able to store, amplify, and discharge the storm's heavy lightning to lethal effect. Rey Dau is highly territorial and will attack any and all intruders on sight. The fulgurite against its carapace emits a sound that puts every monster in the region on guard.
EM0156_00_0.tips: When a Rey Dau's wing or tail touches the ground while charged, it causes a reaction that produces a mantle of fulgurite. Not only does this widen the appendage's attack range, but it also increases the monster's charging capacity—so make a point of breaking these parts. Their heads may also be vulnerable after a discharge attack. Hunters are advised to bring thunder- resistant armor and water-based weaponry.

explain_langs.Japanese: 隔ての砂原、その生態系の頂点に君臨する ≪煌雷竜（こうらいりゅう）≫。雷をともなう 砂嵐に適応し、帯電能力を活かし獲物を襲う。
explain_langs.English: The flying wyvern that reigns supreme over the Windward Plains' ecosystem. It is able to store, amplify, and discharge the Sandtide's lightning.
explain_langs.French: Wyverne volante qui règne sans partage sur les Plaines venteuses. Peut emmagasiner, amplifier et libérer la foudre des tempêtes de sable.
explain_langs.Italian: Wyvern volante che regna sovrano sulle Piane ventose. Può immagazzinare, amplificare e rilasciare i fulmini della tempesta di sabbia.
explain_langs.German: Der Flugwyvern ist der unangefochtene Herrscher über das Ökosystem der Windebene. Er kann die Blitze der Sandflut speichern und abgeben.
explain_langs.Spanish: Wyvern volador que ejerce su supremacía en el ecosistema de los Llanos Barlovento. Almacena, amplifica y descarga rayos de la marea de arena.
explain_langs.Russian: Летающая виверна с Наветренных равнин. Копит грозовую энергию песчаного прилива, а потом усиливает и высвобождает её.
explain_langs.Polish: Wiwerna latająca, która panuje nad ekosystemem Nawietrznych Równin. Potrafi magazynować, wzmacniać i rozładowywać błyskawice fali piaskowej.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: A serpe alada que reina suprema nas Planícies Zéfiras. É capaz de armazenar, amplificar e descarregar a eletricidade da Maré de Areia.
explain_langs.Korean: 경계의 모래 평원 생태계의 정점에 군림하는 《황뢰룡》. 벼락을 동반하는 모래 폭풍에 적응해 대전 능력으로 사냥감을 공격한다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 君臨天塹沙原生態系頂點的飛龍種。適應了雷電 交加的沙塵暴，並會利用帶電能力襲擊獵物。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 君临天堑沙原生态系统顶点的飞龙种。不仅适应了 雷电交加的沙尘暴，还会利用带电能力攻击猎物。
explain_langs.Arabic: الوايفرن الطائر الذي يهيمن على النظام البيئي في سهول (ويندوارد). إنه قادر على تخزين برق المد الرملي وتضخيمه وتفريغه.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Wyvern volador que ejerce su supremacía en el ecosistema de los Llanos Ventosos. Puede almacenar, amplificar y descargar rayos de la marea de arena.

EM0157_00_0.name: Uth Duna
EM0157_00_0.explain: The leviathan that reigns supreme over the Scarlet Forest's ecosystem. Its protective veil can also generate a wave to keep foes at bay.
EM0157_00_0.features: The leviathan that reigns supreme over the Scarlet Forest's ecosystem. It has adapted to water-rich environments and is sighted most often during the Downpour. Uth Duna's secretions when combined with water form a protective veil that not only absorbs hostile blows but also adds weight, which it slams down with enough force to sweep away surrounding threats in the resulting wave.
EM0157_00_0.tips: Seeing as an Uth Duna's veil reduces attack damage, the first order of business is to dispel it quickly. It will fall away once it loses enough water, but that's not entirely good news; without the veil weighing the monster down, an Uth Duna will become more agile and aggressive. You can dodge their wave with some creative evading, or by using things like Wedge Beetles to escape upward.

explain_langs.Japanese: 緋の森に君臨する≪波衣竜（はごろもりゅう）≫。 水分をヴェール状に変化させて身を守りつつ、 重い一撃で波を起こして押し流す。
explain_langs.English: The leviathan that reigns supreme over the Scarlet Forest's ecosystem. Its protective veil can also generate a wave to keep foes at bay.
explain_langs.French: Le léviathan qui règne sur la Forêt écarlate. Son voile protecteur peut générer une vague repoussant les adversaires.
explain_langs.Italian: Leviathan che regna incontrastato sulla Foresta cremisi. Il suo velo protettivo può generare un'onda per tenere a bada i nemici.
explain_langs.German: Der Leviathan, der das Ökosystem des Karmin- walds beherrscht. Sein schützender Schleier kann eine Welle erzeugen, die Feinde fernhält.
explain_langs.Spanish: Leviatán que ejerce su supremacía en el ecosistema del Bosque Escarlata. Su velo protector puede generar una onda que mantiene a raya al enemigo.
explain_langs.Russian: Исполинский левиафан родом из Багряного леса. Покрывает себя защитной оболочкой и атакует врагов разрушительными цунами.
explain_langs.Polish: Lewiatan, który panuje nad ekosystemem Szkarłatnego Lasu. Jego ochronny woal może generować fale odstraszające wrogów.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: O leviatã que reina supremo sobre o ecossistema da Floresta Escarlate. Seu véu protetor também pode gerar uma onda para afastar inimigos.
explain_langs.Korean: 주홍빛 숲에 군림하는 《파의룡》. 수분을 베일 형태로 변화시켜 몸을 지키면서 묵직한 일격으로 파도를 일으켜 휩쓴다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 君臨緋紅森林生態系頂點的海龍種。能將水分變成 液膜來保護自身，並以強力的一擊引發波浪衝走 敵人。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 君临绯红森林的海龙种。能将水分变成面纱状以保 护自身，并以重重一击掀起波浪冲走敌人。
explain_langs.Arabic: وحش (ليفياثان) الذي يهيمن على النظام البيئي للغابة القرمزية. يمكن لوشاحه الواقي أيضًا أن يولِّد موجة لإبقاء الأعداء بعيدًا.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: El leviatán que ejerce su supremacía en el Bosque Escarlata. Su velo protector puede generar una onda que mantiene a raya al enemigo.

EM0158_00_0.name: Nu Udra
EM0158_00_0.explain: The cephalopod that reigns supreme over Oilwell Basin's ecosystem. A vision of hell, it attacks with tentacles and ignited oilsilt.
EM0158_00_0.features: The cephalopod that reigns supreme over Oilwell Basin's ecosystem. Usually, when sighted, Nu Udra is covered in oilsilt, but when enraged it will ignite the coating, transfiguring itself into a horror of flame. The oculi that appear on its body and many arms are presumed to be sensory organs, but the truth is still being investigated.
EM0158_00_0.tips: Each of a Nu Udra's many unique tentacles can be severed. But watch out when they get angry and burst into flame. You can douse any parts that are burning with watermoss— a recommended strategy, since it will leave the monster weakened. A Nu Udra's soft body allows them to slip through crevasses and move in surprising ways, so be careful not to let them get the jump on you.

explain_langs.Japanese: 油涌き谷に君臨する≪獄焔蛸（ごくえんしょう）≫。 煉獄の如き激しい炎を全身にまとい、複数の腕と 燃え盛る油泥を駆使して獲物を追い詰める。
explain_langs.English: The cephalopod that reigns supreme over Oilwell Basin's ecosystem. A vision of hell, it attacks with tentacles and ignited oilsilt.
explain_langs.French: Le céphalopode qui règne sur le Bassin pétrolier. Il attaque avec ses tentacules et enflamme le limon, une véritable vision d'horreur.
explain_langs.Italian: Il cefalopode che regna sovrano sul Bacino petrolifero. Una bestia infernale che attacca con i tentacoli e il fango oleoso infuocato.
explain_langs.German: Ein Cephalopode, der über das Ölquellbecken herrscht. Es ist ein höllischer Anblick, wenn er mit Tentakeln und brennendem Ölschlamm angreift.
explain_langs.Spanish: Cefalópodo que ejerce su supremacía en el ecosistema de la Cuenca Oleosa. Tiene un aspecto infernal y ataca con tentáculos y fango en llamas.
explain_langs.Russian: Крупнейшее головоногое в экосистеме Нефтяной низины, будто вылезшее прямиком из ада. Швыряется горящей донной нефтью.
explain_langs.Polish: Głowonóg dominujący nad innymi organizmami ekosystemu Kotliny Oleju. Ucieleśnienie piekła, atakuje mackami i zapala oleisty muł.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Cefalópode que reina supremo sobre o ecossistema da Bacia Oleídea. Uma real visão do inferno, ataca com seus tentáculos e limóleo incendiário.
explain_langs.Korean: 기름 솟는 계곡에 군림하는 《염옥소》. 연옥처럼 거친 화염을 전신에 두르고 팔들과 불타는 기름 진흙으로 사냥감을 몰아붙인다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 君臨湧油山谷生態系頂點的頭足種。全身被有如 煉獄般猛烈的火焰籠罩著，會利用多隻觸手與 猛烈燃燒的油泥將獵物逼入絕路。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 君临涌油谷的“狱焰蛸”。全身笼罩着宛如来自炼 狱的熊熊烈火，利用多只触手和燃烧的油泥将猎物 逼进绝路。
explain_langs.Arabic: وحش (سيفالوبود) الذي يهيمن على النظام البيئي لحوض آبار النفط. كابوس من الجحيم، يهاجم بالمسجات وطمي النفط المشتعل.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Cefalópodo que ejerce su supremacía en el ecosistema de la Cuenca Oleosa. Tiene un aspecto infernal y ataca con tentáculos y fango ardiente.

EM0159_00_0.name: Ajarakan
EM0159_00_0.explain: Fanged beasts that adhere metal to their bodies and use friction to heat and cause explosions. They move in groups during the Firespring.
EM0159_00_0.features: Characteristic by their highly developed carapaces, Ajarakan wrap themselves in molten metal that they rub together to heat up and create explosions. Presumably due to the friction of the metal, they can reach high enough temperatures to melt even the ground or bullets. They can also use their strong limbs to grip onto the ceiling and move around freely, so a hunter must watch out from every angle, including above.
EM0159_00_0.tips: Approaching an Ajarakan's extreme heat will sap your health, so use cool drinks or Chillmantle Bugs to counteract it. Normal Ammo and arrows will melt if you try to pierce their molten carapaces, so you must use heat-resistant equipment or hit them with Watermoss to bring down their temperature first. Continuous friction will cause their body temperature to rise, but soften their outer shells.

explain_langs.Japanese: 体に付着した金属をこすり合わせ、高温になり 爆発を引き起こす牙獣種。火走りの時期には 複数頭で行動する姿が目撃される。
explain_langs.English: Fanged beasts that adhere metal to their bodies and use friction to heat and cause explosions. They move in groups during the Firespring.
explain_langs.French: Bêtes à crocs qui se recouvrent de métal et créent des explosions par friction. Se déplacent en groupe pendant la coulée de feu.
explain_langs.Italian: Belve zannute che si coprono di metallo per surriscaldarsi e provocare esplosioni. Si muovono in branco durante la primafiamma.
explain_langs.German: Reißzahn-Bestien, die sich in Metall hüllen und durch Reibung Explosionen auslösen. Zur Feuerschwemme in Gruppen unterwegs.
explain_langs.Spanish: Bestias de colmillos que adhieren metal a sus cuerpos y emplean la fricción para calentarse y explotar. Al brotar la Fuente van en grupo.
explain_langs.Russian: Клыкастые звери, покрывающие свои тела металлом. Нагревают металл трением, что приводит к взрывам. В сезон извержения огня сбиваются в стаи.
explain_langs.Polish: Zębate bestie, które przyczepiają metal do swoich ciał i tarciem rozgrzewają się, powodując eksplozje. W czasie Źródła Ognia wędrują w stadach.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Feras de presas que fixam metal aos seus corpos e usam atrito para se aquecer e causar explosões. Movem-se em grupos durante a Nascente Ígnea.
explain_langs.Korean: 몸에 붙은 금속을 마찰시켜 온도를 높여 폭발을 일으키는 아수종. 불꽃 질주 시기에는 여러 마리가 함께 행동하는 모습이 목격된다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 牙獸種，會摩擦身體上附著的金屬產生高溫並引發 爆炸。在奔火節期間，可目擊到牠們成群結隊行動 的樣子。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 牙兽种。会摩擦身上附着的金属，产生高温并引发 爆炸。在奔火祭典时期，经常可以目击到数头赫猿 兽一起行动。
explain_langs.Arabic: وحوش ذات أنياب تُلصق المعدن بأجسامها وتستخدم الاحتكاك لرفع حرارتها وإحداث انفجارات. إنها تتحرك في مجموعات أثناء ينبوع النيران.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Bestias que adhieren metal a sus cuerpos y usan la fricción para calentarse y generar explosiones. Se mueven en grupo durante el brote ígneo.

EM0160_00_0.name: Arkveld
EM0160_00_0.explain: A wyvern with chain-like wings. The flexible chainblades on their wings are used to mow down prey and absorb elemental energy.
EM0160_00_0.features: A flying wyvern that was considered extinct according to documents left behind by the Guild. Their wings have a unique, chain-like blade that can extend and retract freely to reap their prey. They feed on elemental energy absorbed through these chainblades, and are able to convert the energy to unleash dragon element attacks.
EM0160_00_0.tips: The more energy this monster absorbs, the more ferocious its attacks become. Once they fill their energy tanks, their chainblades will sweep out to attack an even wider area. Conversely, since their wings possess organs that absorb energy, a hunter can force the energy to leak out by focusing attacks there. Flooding them with continuous elemental attacks will eventually overload the organs, forcing the monster out of its enhanced state.

explain_langs.Japanese: 鎖のような形状の翼をもつ飛竜。 翼の鎖刃は伸縮自在で、獲物を薙ぎ払うほか 属性エネルギーの吸収にも活用される。
explain_langs.English: A wyvern with chain-like wings. The flexible chainblades on their wings are used to mow down prey and absorb elemental energy.
explain_langs.French: Wyverne aux ailes souples pourvues de lames évoquant des chaînes, qui lui permettent de renverser sa proie et d'absorber son énergie.
explain_langs.Italian: Un wyvern con ali simili a catene. Le flessibili lame a catena sulle sue ali servono a falciare le prede e assorbire energia elementale.
explain_langs.German: Ein Wyvern mit kettenähnlichen Flügeln. Die flexiblen Kettenklingen an den Flügeln zer- fetzen Beute und absorbieren Elementenergie.
explain_langs.Spanish: Un wyvern con alas en forma de cadenas. Con los filos flexibles de los cadenáculos rebanan a sus presas y absorben su energía elemental.
explain_langs.Russian: Виверна с похожими на цепи крыльями. Их режущими звеньями она не только разит добычу, но и поглощает энергию стихий.
explain_langs.Polish: Wiwerna ze skrzydłami przypominającymi łańcuchy. Elastyczne ogniwa na skrzydłach umożliwiają powalenie ofiary i pochłanianie energii żywiołów.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Serpe com asas similares a correntes. As partes flexíveis e afiadas são usadas para rasgar as presas e absorver energia elemental.
explain_langs.Korean: 사슬 모양 날개를 가진 비룡. 날개에 달린 사슬날은 자유롭게 신축하며 사냥감을 베어내고 속성 에너지를 흡수할 때도 활용된다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 擁有鎖鏈形翅膀的飛龍。翅膀上的鎖刃伸縮自如， 不但能橫掃獵物，還能吸收屬性能量。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 拥有锁链形翅膀的飞龙。两翼的锁刃伸缩自如， 不仅可以横扫猎物，还能用于吸收属性能量。
explain_langs.Arabic: وايفرن ذو أجنحة تشبه السلاسل. تُستخدم الشفرات المرنة بشكل سلاسل على أجنحته لقتل الفريسة وامتصاص الطاقة العناصرية.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Un wyvern con alas en forma de cadenas. Las hojas flexibles de las cadenas se emplean para rebanar a sus presas y absorber energía elemental.

EM0160_50_0.name: Guardian Arkveld
EM0160_50_0.explain: An artificial species created by an ancient civilization based on a presumed extinct, legendary monster called Arkveld.
EM0160_50_0.features: An artificial species created by an ancient civilization and imbued with the power of a monster called Arkveld. It cannot reproduce and does not require food, relying instead on Wyvern Milk for energy. In addition to absorbing and discharging energy the way other Guardians do, Guardian Arkveld can also absorb elemental energy through the chainblades on its wings and use it for sustenance.
EM0160_50_0.tips: Guardian Arkveld use retractable chainblades on their wings to attack. Not only are the blades used to absorb and release energy like other Guardians, but they can also convert the energy to the dragon element and discharge it, which will trigger an explosion of the same element if it comes into contact with Wylkrystals. The crystals formed by their attacks will explode from elemental interference, making Slinger ammo effective.

explain_langs.Japanese: 古代文明によって、≪鎖刃竜≫の力を宿し 生み出された造竜種。その原種は既に滅びた 種として知られている伝説的な存在。
explain_langs.English: An artificial species created by an ancient civilization based on a presumed extinct, legendary monster called Arkveld.
explain_langs.French: Espèce artificielle créée par une ancienne civilisation basée sur l'Arkveld, un monstre légendaire qu'on pensait éteint.
explain_langs.Italian: Una specie artificiale creata da un'antica civiltà e basata su un mostro leggendario chiamato Arkveld, ritenuto estinto.
explain_langs.German: Eine von einer uralten Zivilisation auf Basis eines legendären und ausgestorben geglaubten Monsters namens Arkveld geschaffene Spezies.
explain_langs.Spanish: Una especie artificial creada por una civilización ancestral a imagen de un monstruo llamado Arkveld, supuestamente extinto.
explain_langs.Russian: Древняя цивилизация, создавшая этих монстров, наделила их силой легендарного существа, считавшегося вымершим и известного как арквельд.
explain_langs.Polish: Sztuczny gatunek wyhodowany przez starożytną cywilizację oparty na legendarnym potworze Arkveldzie, którego uznano za gatunek wymarły.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Espécie artificial criada por uma civilização antiga com base em um monstro lendário e que se supunha extinto chamado Arkveld.
explain_langs.Korean: 고대 문명에 의해 《쇄인룡》의 힘을 품고 만들어진 인조룡종. 원종은 이미 멸종된 종으로 알려진 전설적인 존재다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 古代文明創造的造龍種，帶有鎖刃龍之力。 其原種早已滅絕，是傳說中的生物。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 古代文明创造出的造龙种，带有锁刃龙之力。 普遍认为其原种早已灭绝，是传说般的生物。
explain_langs.Arabic: سلالة اصطناعية خلّقتها حضارة قديمة مستوحاة من وحش أسطوري اسمه (آركفيلد) ساد اعتقاد بأنه منقرض.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Una especie artificial creada por una antigua civilización con base en un monstruo legendario llamado Arkveld que se creía extinto.

EM0161_00_0.name: Hirabami
EM0161_00_0.explain: Leviathans that inhabit the Iceshard Cliffs. They have sharp, pincer-like tails and membranes on their necks that catch the wind to keep them aloft.
EM0161_00_0.features: Leviathans that inhabit the Iceshard Cliffs. They have sharp, pincer-like tails and peculiar membranes on their necks that catch the wind and keep them aloft. Hirabami can sometimes be sighted nesting in groups along the cliffs, using their scales or foreclaws to cling to walls or ceilings while they sleep.
EM0161_00_0.tips: Hirabami can remain aloft as they maneuver skillfully between the ground and the sky. You'll need to watch out for those tail claws, but handle an attack well to turn it into a counterstrike opportunity. Destroying the membrane on their necks will lower their guards while aloft. Furthermore, you can target the membrane wound to knock them out of the air, making this a prime target.

explain_langs.Japanese: 氷霧の断崖に生息する海竜種。尻尾に鋏状の 尾爪を備え、首にある特殊な膜に風を受けて 浮遊する独特な飛行生態をもつ。
explain_langs.English: Leviathans that inhabit the Iceshard Cliffs. They have sharp, pincer-like tails and membranes on their necks that catch the wind to keep them aloft.
explain_langs.French: Léviathans vivant dans les Falaises de glace. Dotés d'une queue acérée et de membranes sur le cou qui leur permettent de voler.
explain_langs.Italian: Leviathan delle Scogliere ghiaccioaguzzo. Hanno code affilate simili a chele e membrane sul collo che catturano il vento per farli volare.
explain_langs.German: Leviathane, die in den Eissplitterklippen leben. Sie haben zangenartige Schwänze sowie Membra- nen, die Wind fangen und sie in der Luft halten.
explain_langs.Spanish: Leviatanes de los Acantilados del Témpano. Tienen colas afiladas como pinzas, y membranas en el cuello por las que cogen aire para flotar.
explain_langs.Russian: Левиафаны, живущие на Ледяных утёсах. Из их хвостов торчат острые, похожие на жвала когти, а перепонки на шее позволяют им парить в воздухе.
explain_langs.Polish: Lewiatany zamieszkujące Lodowcowe Klify. Mają ostre, przypominające szczypce ogony i błony na szyi, które pełnią rolę żagla i pozwalają im utrzymać się w powietrzu.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Leviatãs que habitam as Escarpas Frígidas. Possuem uma cauda afiada em forma de pinça e uma membrana no pescoço que absorve vento para mantê-los no alto.
explain_langs.Korean: 빙무의 절벽에 서식하는 해룡종. 집게 형태의 꼬리발톱이 있고, 목의 특수한 막으로 바람을 타고 부유하는 독특한 습성을 지녔다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 棲息在冰霧斷崖的海龍種。尾巴有鉗狀的尾爪， 會以獨特方式飛行，更能利用頸部的特殊膜乘風 飄浮。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 栖息在冰雾断崖的海龙种。尾部长有钳状的尾爪， 有着独特的飞行生态，能利用颈部特殊的膜乘风 飘飞。
explain_langs.Arabic: وحوش (ليفياثان) تستوطن منحدرات الشظايا الجليدية. تحوذ ذيولًا حادة تشبه الكماشة وأغشية على رقباتها تمتلئ بالهواء لتجعلها تحلّق.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Leviatanes de los Acantilados Espinahelada, con colas filosas como pinzas y membranas especiales en el cuello que atrapan aire para poder flotar.

EM0162_00_0.name: Jin Dahaad
EM0162_00_0.explain: A leviathan that sits at the peak of the Iceshard Cliffs' ecosystem. It generates cold air via cooling organs across its massive body.
EM0162_00_0.features: A leviathan that sits at the peak of the Iceshard Cliffs' ecosystem. It surrounds its massive form in cold temperatures via ridge-like cooling organs across its body; the frost its limbs produce doubles as a potent weapon and a way to travel along walls and floating rocks.
EM0162_00_0.tips: Every part of Jin Dahaad's massive body is capable of powerful freezing attacks. Diminish their offensive capabilities by attacking the ridges that they use for cooling. The largest ridges on their back are particularly powerful and should be destroyed, but the hide there is very tough unless the other ridges are dealt with first.

explain_langs.Japanese: 氷霧の断崖、生態系の頂点に君臨する≪凍峰竜 （とうほうりゅう）≫。巨大な体躯を誇り、 冷却器官による気化熱で超低温を生み出す。
explain_langs.English: A leviathan that sits at the peak of the Iceshard Cliffs' ecosystem. It generates cold air via cooling organs across its massive body.
explain_langs.French: Léviathan trônant au sommet de l'écosystème des Falaises de glace. Génère de l'air froid grâce à des organes répartis sur son énorme corps.
explain_langs.Italian: Un Leviathan che si trova in cima all'ecosistema delle Scogliere ghiaccioaguzzo. Genera aria fredda con gli organi del suo enorme corpo.
explain_langs.German: Ein Leviathan, der an der Spitze des Öko- systems der Eissplitterklippen steht. Generiert mit Kühlorganen kalte Luft.
explain_langs.Spanish: Un leviatán que está en la cima del ecosistema de los Acantilados del Témpano. Genera aire frío a través de sus órganos refrigerantes.
explain_langs.Russian: Исполинский левиафан с Ледяных утёсов. Находится на вершине пищевой цепи. Может резко понижать температуру воздуха при помощи особых органов.
explain_langs.Polish: Lewiatan, który znajduje się na szczycie ekosystemu Lodowcowych Klifów. Tworzy zimne powietrze poprzez organy chłodzące w całym swoim potężnym ciele.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Um leviatã que fica no topo do ecossistema das Escarpas Frígidas. Gera ar frio através de órgãos de resfriamento espalhados por seu enorme corpo.
explain_langs.Korean: 빙무의 절벽, 생태계의 정점에 군림하는 《동봉룡》. 거대한 몸집을 자랑하며, 냉각 기관의 기화열로 초저온을 만들어낸다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 君臨冰霧斷崖生態系頂點的海龍種。有巨大身軀， 能以冷卻器官吸收汽化熱，將周遭降至超低溫。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 君临冰雾断崖生态系统顶点的怪物，拥有引以为 豪的巨大身躯。能运用汽化的原理，通过冷却器 官制造出超低温。
explain_langs.Arabic: (ليفياثان) يتربع على قمة النظام البيئي لمنحدرات الشظايا الجليدية. يولد هواءً باردًا عن طريق أعضاء تبريد منتشرة في جسمه الهائل.
explain_langs.LatinAmericanSpanish: Un leviatán que habita en la cima de los Acantilados Espinahelada. Genera aire frío con los órganos refrigerantes de su masivo cuerpo.

EM0163_00_0.name: Xu Wu
EM0163_00_0.explain: Cephalopods that roam the Ruins of Wyveria and prey on Guardians. This often leads to conflicts between the two monsters.
EM0163_00_0.features: Cephalopod predators whose prey include Guardian monsters. The mucus secreted from their tentacles hardens quickly into sharp edges that resemble blades or spears, which is why some call Xu Wu the "Piercing Assassin." The sizable mouth hidden on their underside allows them to devour even rather large prey.
EM0163_00_0.tips: Due to their predatory nature, you can expect Xu Wu to attack Guardians inside their habitat. They have no eyes, but their other senses are developed and they excel at catching prey off guard, especially with their ability to enter small crevices and crawl quickly across the ground. When one exposes its mouth, that means a deadly attack is coming, but with a powerful blow, you might be able to topple the creature.

explain_langs.Japanese: 竜都の跡形を根城に、護竜を捕食する頭足種。 そのため、護竜とのモンスター同士の争いを 引き起こすこともある。
explain_langs.English: Cephalopods that roam the Ruins of Wyveria and prey on Guardians. This often leads to conflicts between the two monsters.
explain_langs.French: Céphalopode errant dans les Ruines de Wyveria et qui s'attaque aux Gardiens. Cela conduit souvent à des conflits entre les deux monstres.
explain_langs.Italian: I cefalopodi vagano per le Rovine di Wyveria e cacciano i guardiani. Per questo motivo, i due mostri sono spesso in conflitto.
explain_langs.German: Cephalopoden, die in den Ruinen von Wyveria leben und Wächter fressen, wodurch es oft zu Kämpfen zwischen Monstern und Wächtern kommt.
explain_langs.Spanish: Cefalópodos que deambulan por las Ruinas de Wyveria atacando a los Guardianes. Esto suele dar lugar a enfrentamientos entre los monstruos.
explain_langs.Russian: Головоногие монстры, обитающие в руинах Виверии. Охотятся на стражей и часто вступают с ними в стычки.
explain_langs.Polish: Cefalopody, które wędrują po Ruinach Wiwierii i polują na Strażników. Często prowadzi to do konfliktów między tymi dwoma gatunkami.
explain_langs.PortugueseBr: Cefalópodes que vagam pelas Ruínas de Serperia e atacam Guardiões. Isso costuma gerar conflitos entre os dois monstros.
explain_langs.Korean: 용도의 폐허를 근거지로 삼아 수호룡을 잡아먹는 두족종. 이 때문에 수호룡과의 싸움이 일어나는 일도 있다.
explain_langs.TransitionalChinese: 盤據在龍都遺跡的頭足種，會捕食護龍。有時候 會和護龍互相打鬥。
explain_langs.SimplelifiedChinese: 盘踞在龙都遗迹的头足种。以捕食护龙为生，因 此会与护龙发生争斗。
